relationships.description: Financial advisor/client relationship regarding oil options trading
Providing financial analysis and trading recommendations

analysis.purpose: To provide oil options trading recommendations and market analysis based on geopolitical events in Crimea/Russia
analysis.significance: Shows financial advisors providing sophisticated trading strategies based on geopolitical analysis to a client (likely Jeffrey Epstein)

notable_quotes: My central scenario - Kerry Lavrov meeting Friday will be a bust and the Crimea referendum this weekend will result in 'yes' given the 59pct ethic Russian makeup.
I'm worried there is a 30-40pct(?) chance of a hard risk off move in markets in first half of next week - more focused on European equities, copper, EM FX than SPX.
In that scenario oil is way up.
red_flags: High-risk trading strategies based on geopolitical events
Short-term options trading with significant leverage

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - purely financial market analysis and trading recommendations

illegal_activity.description: Document contains legitimate financial analysis and trading recommendations from Deutsche Bank employees to a client. No illegal activity discussed or planned.

public_knowledge.context: The 2014 Crimea crisis and related geopolitical events were widely covered in international media. Financial market analysis of geopolitical events is common practice in investment banking.

analysis.summary: Deutsche Bank employees provide Jeffrey Epstein with oil options trading strategies and market analysis based on the geopolitical situation surrounding the 2014 Crimea referendum and potential sanctions against Russia, recommending specific option positions with different time horizons.
